content: add some modern farmhouse flair to your christmas décor with the crochet country stockings you can make all striped stockings or all solids or a good mix of the two either way these christmas stockings will be beautiful hanging from your mantle skill level easy sizes 19 5 by 5 75 hook size us size j/10 6 0 mm yarn 5 5 oz category 4 medium weight yarn stitches chain single_crochet slip_stitch decrease pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com link text 1 1 https //www stitching-together com/crochet-christmas-stocking/
